remarks: Closure law for the scalar product operation of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvscl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvscl.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvscl $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC /\ B e. X ) -> ( A S B ) e. X ) $.
